title: Chesapeake Bay: Large Landscape Conservation Meeting November 2013
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Planning     Landscape Conservation     Large Landscape Conservation Meeting November 2013                LLC Partnership Meeting November 2013       More than fifty partners gathered at the National Conservation Training Center on November 12 and 13, 2013, to further their shared work on large landscape conservation. The primary focus of the meeting was on developing shared agreements on how to further communication and collaboration efforts among the partners and focus energy on priority action areas. This meeting builds on a series of meetings, held almost annually since 2009, to advance large landscape collaboration in the Chesapeake watershed.  Read the meeting summary.
